page.title: 20LOOKING TOWARDS THE FUTURE
page.content: Although younger residents would like to have{modern facilities}such as leisure/sports centres. swimming pool, more adult education, leisure activities for teenagers, (plus a pedestrian crossing considering the heavy traffic through the village,) longer library hours and a better bus service they appreciate that such facilities are available in the three nearby towns. Many villagers with{the interest of {the community at heart}spend much time and effort in maintaining village activities. We wish them well for the future. This report has been compiled by the staff and children of Denholme First School with the enthusiastic help of many parents and members of the community and our thanks go to them all.
